org.jcatapult.mvc.result.message.control
Class Message

java.lang.Object
  org.jcatapult.mvc.result.control.AbstractControl
      org.jcatapult.mvc.result.message.control.Message
All Implemented Interfaces:
freemarker.template.TemplateDirectiveModel, freemarker.template.TemplateMethodModel, freemarker.template.TemplateModel, Control
public class Message
extends AbstractControl
implements freemarker.template.TemplateMethodModel, freemarker.template.TemplateDirectiveModel

This class a a FreeMarker method model as well as the control for the message JSP tag.

Author:
Brian Pontarelli

Method Detail

addAdditionalAttributes

protected void addAdditionalAttributes(Map<String,Object> attributes,
                                       Map<String,String> dynamicAttributes)
Determines the bundle and then gets the message and puts it into the attributes.

Overrides:
addAdditionalAttributes in class AbstractControl
Parameters:
attributes - Used to get the bundle and store the message.
dynamicAttributes - Not used.

exec

public Object exec(List arguments)
            throws freemarker.template.TemplateModelException
Calls the AbstractControl.renderStart(Writer, Map, Map) and AbstractControl.renderEnd(Writer) methods using a StringWriter to collect the result and the first and second parameters to the method. The first is the key and the second is the bundle, which can be left out.

Specified by:
exec in interface freemarker.template.TemplateMethodModel
Parameters:
arguments - The method arguments.
Returns:
The result.
Throws:
freemarker.template.TemplateModelException - If the action is null and bundle is not specified.

startTemplateName

protected String startTemplateName()
Specified by:
startTemplateName in class AbstractControl
Returns:
The name of the FreeMarker template that this control renders when it starts.

endTemplateName

protected String endTemplateName()
Specified by:
endTemplateName in class AbstractControl
Returns:
The name of the FreeMarker template that this control renders when it ends.
